Name: optCbStartingLabors
Tooltip: You can have your dwarves start/arrive without any labor types enabled here by setting this to NO.  You can also set it to SKILLS to make the labor list set by skill, or BY_UNIT_TYPE to have it done by overall unit type.

Name: optBtnTemperature
Tooltip: Turns temperature on or off. OFF helps FPS extremely, although robs you of many game features.

Name: optBtnWeather
Tooltip: Turn weather on or off. Rain might be useful to fill ponds. OFF helps FPS.

Name: optBtnCaveins
Tooltip: Turn cave-in physics on or off. No more injured miners, but also no cave-in traps... your choice.

Name: optBtnInvaders
Tooltip: Turn invaders completely on or off. Might rob you of !FUN!

Name: optBtnLiquidDepth
Tooltip: Turn Liquid depth on or off, as you like.

Name: optBtnAdvCenter
Tooltip: Decides if the camera always centers on your adventurer or not.

Name: optBtnAdvTraps
Tooltip: Decides if you adventurer is affected by traps or not.

Name: optBtnPetCoffins
Tooltip: Enable to disallow pets from coffin burial as the default option.

Name: optNumPopCap
Tooltip: 0 - 9999  Set the amount of maximum dwarves. Mind that min. 2 migrant waves will appear.

Name: optMaskChildBabyCap
Tooltip: ####:####  The first number is an absolute cap on babies + children. The second is a percentage of the current number of adults.

Name: optBtnAutoSavePause
Tooltip: Pauses after auto-saving.

Name: optBtnAutoBackup
Tooltip: These saves will be stored in a new folder, automatically

Name: optBtnEmbarkSave
Tooltip: Save at embark.

Name: optBtnCompressSaves
Tooltip: Compress saves to reduce file sizes.

Name: optBtnPauseLoad
Tooltip: Paused when you load an old game.

Name: optBtnTransformMsgs
Tooltip: Stops the game and tells you whenever a creature transforms. Great for spotting important events, but might slow down the game flow. Your choice, of course.

Name: optBtnDigStop
Tooltip: Turn this OFF to remove the pause/recenter when you find damp/hot stones.

Name: optNumMacro
Tooltip: 0 - 999999  This controls the number of milliseconds between macro instructions.

Name: optCbWindow
Tooltip: Switches from windowed to full-screen mode.

Name: optCbPriority
Tooltip: Determines how much processor time should be allocated to Dwarf Fortress.

Name: optBtnIntro
Tooltip: Turns the intro video on or off. OFF leads to a faster start-up.

Name: optBtnEmbarkWarn
Tooltip: If enabled, shows a warning before every embark, even if there are no issues.

Name: optMaskEmbarkSize
Tooltip: #:# (# is 1-16)  For a 1:1 embark, nanofortress must be applied!

Name: optCbPrintMode
Tooltip: 2D needed for TrueType, STANDARD needed for Rendermax.

Name: optBtnSprites
Tooltip: Adds custom sprites for creatures. Disable to play with characters only.

Name: optBtnTruetype
Tooltip: Toggle Truetype On/Off. You can do this with F12 while the game is running as well.

Name: optBtnRendermax
Tooltip: Enables the dfhack plugin. You can always disable it while playing with 'rendermax disable' in your dfhack window. Currently you can only have either Rendermax or TTF active and it requires print mode STANDARD.

Name: optBtnSound
Tooltip: Turn sound on or off.

Name: optBtnFps
Tooltip: Shows the current FPS on top left.

Name: optNumGFPS
Tooltip: 0 - 9999  How fast the game visually updates.

Name: optNumFPSCap
Tooltip: 0 - 9999  How fast the game runs.

Name: optBtnCivDwarves
Tooltip: Adds playable Dwarven Civ.

Name: optBtnCivOrcs
Tooltip: Adds taiga orcs to the world.

Name: optBtnCivKobolds
Tooltip: Adds a cutebold civilization to the world.

Name: optBtnGnomes
Tooltip: Adds gnomes to trade with to your game. They will arrive late in the game and only in summer.

Name: optBtnWarlocks
Tooltip: Add foul sorcerers that fight you with magic.

Name: optBtnEvilElves
Tooltip: Adds an elven  invader race to the game.

Name: optBtnEvilDrow
Tooltip: Adds a drow invader race to the game.

Name: optBtnEvilHumans
Tooltip: Adds a human invader race to the game.

Name: optBtnEvilDwarves
Tooltip: Adds a dwarven invader race to the game.

Name: optBtnAntmen
Tooltip: Antmen camp in large numbers in the caverns...

Name: optBtnTroglodytes
Tooltip: More ambushers await you in the deep...

Name: optBtnGremlins
Tooltip: Be careful in the caverns...

Name: optBtnAutomatons
Tooltip: Add a relentless metal race that fights with adv. ranged weapons.

Name: optBtnFrostGiants
Tooltip: Bored and ready for a challenge ? Let the Giants invade your base.

Name: optBtnGoblins
Tooltip: You want to be ambushed by little goblins ? Here you go.

Name: optBtnDrowRace
Tooltip: Adds drow to trade with to your game.

Name: optBtnElfRace
Tooltip: Adds elves to trade with to your game.

Name: optBtnHumanRace
Tooltip: Adds humans to trade with to your game.

Name: optBtnDomesticPets
Tooltip: Adds new pets available through trading and at embark.

Name: optBtnMoreVermin
Tooltip: Adds custom vermin. Some spin webs and are useful, others eat your food away.

Name: optBtnMoreGiantAnimals
Tooltip: Yes keeps giant animal versions in-game. NO removes them.

Name: optBtnMoreMegaBeasts
Tooltip: Adds 25 new semi/megabeasts to the game.

Name: optBtnMoreBirds
Tooltip: Adds or removes +100 bird species to the game, including animal man and giant versions.

Name: optBtnMoreFish
Tooltip: Adds custom fish to pools, oceans and rivers.

Name: optBtnMoreAnimalmen
Tooltip: Yes keeps animal-man versions in-game. NO removes them.

Name: optBtnMoreCavernCreatures
Tooltip: Adds 70 new monsters to fight in the caverns.

Name: optBtnMoreSurfaceCreatures
Tooltip: Adds about 115  surface monsters to fight.

Name: optBtnMoreDemons
Tooltip: Adds custom demons to fight in Hell.

Name: optBtnMoreMagical
Tooltip: Adds about 35 magic-based and otherwise unrealistic creatures to the game.

Name: optCbPatternInvaderSkills
Tooltip: This sets the combat skills for the above races. Be careful not to underestimate the effects of higher skills!

Name: optBtnFdFrogmen
Tooltip: Adds a Fortress Defense race to lay siege to your fortress.

Name: optBtnFdFireImps
Tooltip: Adds a Fortress Defense race to lay siege to your fortress.

Name: optBtnFdStranglers
Tooltip: Adds a Fortress Defense race to lay siege to your fortress.

Name: optBtnFdWerewolfs
Tooltip: Adds a Fortress Defense race to lay siege to your fortress.

Name: optBtnFdBlendecs
Tooltip: Adds a Fortress Defense race to lay siege to your fortress.

Name: optBtnFdSerpentmen
Tooltip: Adds a Fortress Defense race to lay siege to your fortress.

Name: optBtnFdWhiteTigermen
Tooltip: Adds a Fortress Defense race to lay siege to your fortress.

Name: optBtnFdBeakWolfs
Tooltip: Adds a Fortress Defense race to lay siege to your fortress.

Name: optBtnFdElephants
Tooltip: Adds a Fortress Defense race to lay siege to your fortress.

Name: optBtnFdFerricElves
Tooltip: Adds a Fortress Defense race to lay siege to your fortress.

Name: optBtnFdGreatBadgermen
Tooltip: Adds a Fortress Defense race to lay siege to your fortress.

Name: optBtnFdPandashi
Tooltip: Adds a Fortress Defense race to lay siege to your fortress.

Name: optBtnFdRaptormen
Tooltip: Adds a Fortress Defense race to lay siege to your fortress.

Name: optBtnFdHarpies
Tooltip: Adds a Fortress Defense race to lay siege to your fortress.

Name: optBtnFdMinotaurs
Tooltip: Adds a Fortress Defense race to lay siege to your fortress.

Name: optBtnFdJotun
Tooltip: Adds a Fortress Defense race to lay siege to your fortress.

Name: optBtnFdSpiderFiends
Tooltip: Adds a Fortress Defense race to lay siege to your fortress.

Name: optBtnFdNightwings
Tooltip: Adds a Fortress Defense race to lay siege to your fortress.

Name: optBtnSteamEngine
Tooltip: Creates power to be used in machines. Needs water and fuel to work.

Name: optBtnMachineFactory
Tooltip: Build your own turrets, land mines and guardians. (BUGGY but cant be done better for the moment)

Name: optBtnLiquidSpawner
Tooltip: Unlocking the liquid spawner unlocks magma workshops as well. Can spawn water or magma.

Name: optBtnCoinMint
Tooltip: Mints large stacks of copper, silver or gold coins.

Name: optBtnBonecarver
Tooltip: Makes bone items and allows alternate metal productions.

Name: optBtnStonecrafter
Tooltip: Allows the creation of rock items. Great for the start.

Name: optBtnGemcutter
Tooltip: Allows the creation of gem items. Lets you cut big gems into smaller ones as well.

Name: optBtnWoodcrafter
Tooltip: Uses wooden planks to create new items.

Name: optBtnThatchery
Tooltip: Allows the creation of furniture from plant materials, from wicker.

Name: optBtnFurnitureWorkshop
Tooltip: 'Allow the creation of complete itemsets, made of rock, wood, bone or metal.

Name: optBtnTailor
Tooltip: Select specific silk, cloth, leather, shell, scale or chitin for clothing and armor.

Name: optBtnChandler
Tooltip: Creates torches and candles for the rendermax lighting creation buildings.

Name: optBtnFletcher
Tooltip: Makes special ammo and upgrades ranged weapons.

Name: optBtnPottery
Tooltip: Makes clay, fire-clay or kaolinite items, which need to be dried and fired before they can be used.

Name: optBtnGreatDyer
Tooltip: Allows dyeing of finished items. You can select the type and material one by one.

Name: optBtnPainter
Tooltip: Colors furniture using dye, allows for easy color coding of your fort.

Name: optBtnToolmaker
Tooltip: Creates basic tools for advanced buildings. You will want to keep this building.

Name: optBtnPrison
Tooltip: Lock away specific dwarves for a specific time.

Name: optBtnColosseum
Tooltip: Summon enemies to train your soldiers or fight for glory.

Name: optBtnGuildhall
Tooltip: Dwarves can join guilds to get a 200% bonus in learn rate for fitting skills. If disabled, this removes all labor related castes!

Name: optBtnMonastery
Tooltip: Allows dwarves to join the religious castes and creates construction materials for temples. If disabled, this removes the religious castes!

Name: optBtnGarrison
Tooltip: Dwarves can join military groups which gives a 200% learning bonus to military skills. If disabled, this removes all military castes!

Name: optBtnWeightBench
Tooltip: Trains attributes of your dwarves, like strength, endurance and agility.

Name: optBtnStorage
Tooltip: Allows the unpacking of crates from caravans.

Name: optBtnWoodsplitting
Tooltip: Little brother of the sawmill, cuts wood into planks and can smooth some types of wood. Very basic, early workshop.

Name: optBtnScriptorium
Tooltip: Write books to read in libraries, copy research discoveries.

Name: optBtnLibraries
Tooltip: Adds 6 Library section in which your dwarves can read to train their skills.

Name: optBtnBrewery
Tooltip: Allows the refining of alcoholic drinks with sugar. New drinks have special effects..

Name: optBtnSawmill
Tooltip: Cuts wooden logs into 4 blocks to be used in constructions and refines farmed trees.

Name: optBtnFishpond
Tooltip: Indoor fishing area for your fisherdwarves. Great for waterless maps.

Name: optBtnSlaughterhouse
Tooltip: Take megabeast corpses apart for special rewards.

Name: optBtnStables
Tooltip: Allows the indoor feeding of grazers.

Name: optBtnEmbassy
Tooltip: Invite diplomats or traders and challenge beasts and civilizations.

Name: optBtnExpedition
Tooltip: Send expeditions, raiding parties, diplomats and bards throughout the world.

Name: optBtnPodium
Tooltip: Hold speeches to influence nearby dwarves and give them permanent mental attribute boosts.

Name: optBtnResearch
Tooltip: Conduct research to unlock new buildings and furnaces.

Name: optBtnArcheology
Tooltip: Adds Archeologist and fossils. Excavates fossils and creates special items.

Name: optBtnApothecary
Tooltip: Adds a workshop for your hospital. Creates casts, crutches, splints, soap and empties out buckets.

Name: optBtnBiology
Tooltip: Takes invader corpses and might research a permanent bonus against a specific race.

Name: optBtnAltar
Tooltip: Adds the Altar of Armok. Allow your dwarves to pray to Armok for help.

Name: optBtnShrine
Tooltip: Adds the Shrine of Armok. Allow your dwarves to pray to Armok for help.

Name: optBtnTemple
Tooltip: Adds the Temple of Armok. Allow your dwarves to pray to Armok for help.

Name: optBtnTavern
Tooltip: Play music with different instruments to boost your dwarves. Also allows basic gambling and tavern brawls.

Name: optBtnOlon
Tooltip: A trader to buy/sell items for coins. Olon handles food.

Name: optBtnBomrek
Tooltip: A trader to buy/sell items for coins. Bomrek handles basic materials.

Name: optBtnUrist
Tooltip: A trader to buy/sell items for coins. Urist handles weapons and armors.

Name: optBtnTeduk
Tooltip: A trader to buy/sell items for coins. Teduk handles expensive goods.

Name: optBtnIneri
Tooltip: A trader to buy creatures for coins. Ineri specializes in pets.

Name: optBtnAlchemy
Tooltip: Allows transmutation of metals, the creation of gems and special metals. as well as magma and water.

Name: optBtnToxicology
Tooltip: Coat weapons, ammo or traps with different poisons.

Name: optBtnChemistry
Tooltip: Adds chemistry to the game. Mostly used for explosives and acids.

Name: optBtnHerbalist
Tooltip: Refines special plants and woods into useful items and materials for your fort.

Name: optBtnBrazier
Tooltip: Adds a way to make fire, light pipes and create light.

Name: optBtnCandelabra
Tooltip: Adds a way to make fire, light pipes and create light.

Name: optBtnFireplace
Tooltip: Adds a way to make fire, light pipes and create light.

Name: optBtnTorchbearerStatue
Tooltip: Adds a way to make fire, light pipes and create light.

Name: optBtnGemOfLight
Tooltip: Creates a lot of light.

Name: optBtnAmmocaster
Tooltip: Create several new types of ammo in this furnace.

Name: optBtnGunsmith
Tooltip: Adds a gunsmith. You can now create gunpowder and several guns.

Name: optBtnHeavySiegeworks
Tooltip: Adds the ability to make exploding ballista bolts, metal ballistae and catapults and more.

Name: optBtnEngineer
Tooltip: A workshop to upgrade your traps. Only needed if you play with: Weaker trap ON.

Name: optBtnInventor
Tooltip: Invent foreign weapons, shields or armors and copy existing models of them. Can make copies of leather, metal or gem.

Name: optBtnGreatforge
Tooltip: Forges two-handed weapons, kite shields and armor sets.

Name: optBtnGlassforge
Tooltip: Create all kinds of items made of glass.

Name: optBtnGemforge
Tooltip: Allows the creation of gem weapons and armor. Lets you cut big gems into smaller ones as well.

Name: optBtnRockForge
Tooltip: Allows the creation of rock weapons, ammo and basic armor. Great for the start.

Name: optBtnGolemForge
Tooltip: Allows to cast dwarves into mighty metal warriors.

Name: optBtnGreatMagmaForge
Tooltip: Merge several metals into volcanic metal.

Name: optBtnBrickOven
Tooltip: Creates 8 types of colorful blocks. Great for mega-projects.

Name: optBtnCrematorium
Tooltip: Allows the cremation of corpses, body parts and items to regain ash and coke.

Name: optMultiOreProcessor
Tooltip: Separate the ore from rock, allowing greater yield before smelting ores. Also reduces slag and gives free stone.

Name: optBtnKiln
Tooltip: Glaze porcelain, stone and earthware. Create pearlash, gypsum powder, tobacco, hay and more.

Name: optBtnSlagPit
Tooltip: Clear up slag waste products from metal fabrication.

Name: optBtnMagicSchool
Tooltip: Turns dwarves into arcane dwarves and unlocks magic altars. If disabled, this also removes all mage castes!

Name: optBtnElementalMagic
Tooltip: 4 new buildings: Fire, Water, Earth and Air based magic altars to train your mages and do much more.

Name: optBtnWhiteMagic
Tooltip: White magic based on good biomes for 3 unique mages and resurrections.

Name: optBtnBlackMagic
Tooltip: Black magic based on evil biomes for 3 unique mages and raising the undead, vampires, demons and more.

Name: optBtnWarpstonePool
Tooltip: Use warpstone to mutate matter into forgotten beasts.

Name: optBtnRuneArmory
Tooltip: Enchant armors with metal runes for special effects on the wearer.

Name: optBtnRuneWeaponry
Tooltip: Enchant weapons with runes, to allow special effects.

Name: optBtnArmory
Tooltip: Upgrades any armor to the best armor in the game, plate-mail.

Name: optBtnWeaponry
Tooltip: Upgrade all available weapons to an improved version. Has a small chance for a legendary version.

Name: optBtnMegabeastKennel
Tooltip: Train a dwarf to an epic fighter or revive a megabeast by using its soul as reagent. Needs megabeasts and the slaughterhouse.

Name: optBtnWarKennel
Tooltip: Allows to outfit a selection of pets with steel plating.

Name: optBtnDisplayCase
Tooltip: Adds display cases. Raise room value or decorate your fortress.

Name: optBtnPottedPlant
Tooltip: Adds a potted plant as decoration.

Name: optBtnTotems
Tooltip: Adds two buildable totems to the game, just for the looks.

Name: optBtnFountain
Tooltip: Adds a small fountain as decoration for your fortress.

Name: optBtnDwarvenLoo
Tooltip: Adds a toilet, for those that always wondered where dwarves do their business. Can clean buckets and other containers.

Name: optBtnCarpet
Tooltip: Adds several tiles for indoor decoration.

Name: optBtnDecoItems
Tooltip: Adds many new items for dwarven rooms. Use this only with Masterwork Tileset.

Name: optBtnStatues
Tooltip: Adds 4 new statues to the game, demon, beast, skeleton and golem statue.

Name: optBtnBlastFurnace
Tooltip: Mass smelting of ore.

Name: optBtnCrucible
Tooltip: Refine more advanced minerals here.

Name: optBtnFinishingForge
Tooltip: Cold-hammer copper, tin and bronze for an early army.

Name: optBtnMetallurgist
Tooltip: All alloys are created in this workshop.

Name: optBtnArbalest
Tooltip: A new siege engine that fires rapidly at your foes.

Name: optBtnTrebuchet
Tooltip: A new siege engines that fires slow AoE damage at your foes.

Name: optBtnClayOven
Tooltip: Adds several reactions to the kiln and quern about glazing. See the manual for full details.

Name: optBtnCrafts
Tooltip: Adds several new reactions to the craftsman. See manual for full detail.

Name: optBtnQuenMill
Tooltip: Adds several new reactions to the quern and millstone. See manual for full detail.

Name: optBtnMillstone
Tooltip: Adds rock, sand and bone grinding to the millstone.

Name: optBtnStill
Tooltip: Adds several new reactions to the still. See manual for full detail.

Name: optBtnKitchen
Tooltip: Adds several new reactions to the kitchen. See manual for full detail.

Name: optBtnTanner
Tooltip: Adds several new reactions to the tanner. See manual for full detail.

Name: optBtnScrewPress
Tooltip: Adds several new reactions to the screw press. See manual for full detail.

Name: optBtnSoapmaker
Tooltip: Adds or removes the soapmaker building. Regardless of its existence the chemists will still make soap.

Name: optBtnSimpleTrees
Tooltip: Enable to play with fewer tree types. Good for FPS.

Name: optBtnSimpleGems
Tooltip: Enable to play with fewer gem types. Good for FPS.

Name: optBtnSimpleSoil
Tooltip: Enable to play with only one type of sand, soil and clay. Good for FPS.

Name: optBtnSimpleStones
Tooltip: Enable to play with fewer stone types. Good for FPS.

Name: optBtnSimpleMetals
Tooltip: Enable to play with fewer mineral types. Good for FPS.

Name: optMultiSimpleWood
Tooltip: Enable for standardized wood. Disable for every tree to use specific wood names.

Name: optBtnSimplePets
Tooltip: Enable to remove redundant domestic pets. Helps FPS.

Name: optMultiSimpleMeat
Tooltip: Enable to standardize all butchery products to one type of meat.

Name: optBtnSimpleGemShapes
Tooltip: Reduces all gem and stone cut shapes to oval cabochons.

Name: optMultiRazing
Tooltip: Allows titans and some invaders to destroy buildings and walls.

Name: optBtnMoreTrees
Tooltip: Adds +120 different kinds of trees to the game.

Name: optBtnMorePlants
Tooltip: Adds +180 different plants to the game.

Name: optBtnFoodNames
Tooltip: Adds more names for prepared meals, thats it.

Name: optBtnFearTheNight
Tooltip: Adds custom vampires, were-beasts, necromancers and curses to the game.

Name: optBtnAquifier
Tooltip: Turn Aquifer on or off, as you like.

Name: optMultiHarderSmithing
Tooltip: Makes smithing harder. Items might need more then just one bar of metal to be produced.

Name: optMultiHarderFarming
Tooltip: Slower farming and less eggs. Aboveground plants need 1 season, underground plants 4 seasons to grow.

Name: optBtnHarderMining
Tooltip: Adds coal dust and warpstone. Both might hurt your miners when mined.

Name: optBtnHarderLearning
Tooltip: All dwarves learn only half as fast. Makes Guilds more important.

Name: optBtnBodyguards
Tooltip: ON gives caravans bodyguards. OFF means that you have to protect them yourself.

Name: optBtnSecrets
Tooltip: NOTE: This will make your game marginally harder. Build wards to protect you. 6 new sly creatures. Watch your game log.

Name: optBtnDiseases
Tooltip: Adds Halfling's disease mod to the game.  Requires the apothecary to treat the diseases. See the manual for more info.

Name: optBtnRegionalWeather
Tooltip: Adds a lot of special rains, fogs and clouds to all kinds of regions.

Name: optBtnRegionalEffects
Tooltip: Adds specific regional effects, like animated dead in evil regions, to all regions. Good biomes heal dwarves for example.

Name: optBtnSmokeEffects
Tooltip: Adds a couple of smoke effects of different colors to workshops. Have no use but to look pretty.

Name: optBtnNobles
Tooltip: Adds the Overseer, for succession forts, a psychiatrist that calms down dwarves, and the old 20D philosopher, as well as a preacher that helps dwarves throwing tantrums.

Name: optBtnBattlecries
Tooltip: Dwarves and other sentient beings will yell insults and comments at each other in the heat of battle. No effect on game play.

Name: optBtnDiplomats
Tooltip: Adds diplomats for both elves and humans. You can finally order trade goods from their caravan again.

Name: optBtnEnglishDwarves
Tooltip: All dwarven names are now in English. Instead of Urist it will read Dagger.

Name: optBtnBuildDimensions
Tooltip: Adds infos to the building names, like 'Gemcutter 3x3', so you can see how large a building is before you build it.

Name: optNumMineralScarcity
Tooltip: 100 - 10000  The lower the value, the more minerals.

Name: optNumCivNumber
Tooltip: 0 - 300  The number of civilizations placed on the map before history begins.

Name: optNumEmbarkPoints
Tooltip: 0 - 10000  The number of points available for skills and equipment when embarking.

Name: optNumEndYear
Tooltip: 2 - 10000  The number of years of history generated for the world.

Name: optNumPopSize
Tooltip: -1 - 100000  Maximum population of civilization members in the world. -1 is unlimited, but dangerous.

Name: optNumMegabeasts
Tooltip: 0 - 999  The number of megabeasts placed at the beginning of history. All megabeasts are placed in equal proportions.

Name: optNumSemibeasts
Tooltip: 0 - 999  The number of semi-megabeasts placed at the beginning of history. They are placed in equal proportions.

Name: optNumNecromancers
Tooltip: 0 - 999  The number of necromancers.

Name: optNumWerebeasts
Tooltip: 0 - 999  The number of different kinds of were-beasts curses that will exist in the world.

Name: optNumTitans
Tooltip: 0 - 999  The number of titans that exist at the beginning of history.

Name: optNumEvilInteractions
Tooltip: 0 - 999  The number of different types of evil region interactions.

Name: optNumDemons
Tooltip: 0 - 999  The number of different types of demons that will be procedurally generated.

Name: optNumDisturbances
Tooltip: 0 - 999  The number of different disturbed dead that can exist in the world.

Name: optNumNightCreatures
Tooltip: 0 - 999  The number of different types of night creatues that will exist.

Name: optNumEvilClouds
Tooltip: 0 - 999  The total different types of evil clouds that can exist.

Name: optNumBogeymen
Tooltip: 0 - 999  The number of different types of bogeymen that will exist.

Name: optNumEvilRains
Tooltip: 0 - 999  The total amount of different evil rains that can exist.

Name: optNumVampires
Tooltip: 0 - 999  The number of different vampire curses that will exist. Curses are all very similar however.

Name: optNumCaveSizeMin
Tooltip: 1 - 500  The minimum cave length and depth.

Name: optNumCaveSizeMax
Tooltip: 1 - 500  The maximum cave length and depth.

Name: optNumMountainCaves
Tooltip: 0 - 800  The number of mountain caves.

Name: optNumOtherCaves
Tooltip: 0 - 800  The number of non-mountain caves.

Name: optBtnVisibleCaves
Tooltip: If disabled, caves will not be marked on the map.

Name: optNumCaverns
Tooltip: 0 - 3  The number of cavern systems. Less caverns may improve FPS. This number does not include Magma or HFS.

Name: optNumOpenMin
Tooltip: 0 - 100  Minimum cavern openness.

Name: optNumOpenMax
Tooltip: 0 - 100  Maximum cavern openness.

Name: optNumMazeMin
Tooltip: 0 - 100  Minimum cavern passageway density.

Name: optNumMazeMax
Tooltip: 0 - 100  Maximum cavern passageway density.

Name: optNumWaterMin
Tooltip: 0 - 100  Minimum cavern water amount.

Name: optNumWaterMax
Tooltip: 0 - 100  Maximum cavern water amount.

Name: optNumAboveCav1
Tooltip: 5 - 99  Z-Levels of stone above the first cavern layer.

Name: optNumAboveCav2
Tooltip: 1 - 99  Z-Levels of earth between the very bottom of the first cavern, and the very top of the second cavern.

Name: optNumAboveCav3
Tooltip: 1 - 99  Z-Levels of earth between the very bottom of the second cavern, and the very top of the third cavern.

Name: optNumAboveMagma
Tooltip: 1 - 99  Z-Levels between the very highest magma, and the very bottom of the third cavern.

Name: optNumAboveHFS
Tooltip: 2 - 99  Uncertain.  Seems to increase the layers of Semi-Molten Rock and the depth of the magma sea. Only valid if magma layer is present.

Name: optBtnMagmaLake
Tooltip: Determines whether the magma sea exists.

Name: optBtnHFS
Tooltip: Determines if the space below the magma sea exists.

Name: optMaskGoodAreas
Tooltip: ###:###:### (0-500)  The amount of good tiles on the map.

Name: optMaskEvilAreas
Tooltip: ###:###:### (0-500)  The amount of evil tiles on the map.
